input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Ecolution Heavy Weight Eco-Friendly 8 Inch Fry Pan

Item specifications:
Hydrolon water based nonstick - PFOA Free which results in fewer Greenhouse Gases.
Ultra thick aluminum insures consistent heating and guaranteed performance
Our soft silicone handle is easy to grip and stays cool
Dishwasher safe
Printed on 70% recycled materials

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This fry pan is super eco-friendly and will make cooking and cleaning super easy! It’s made of recycled materials and has a special water-based nonstick coating that’s PFOA-free, so it’s better for the environment. Plus, it’s really sturdy and easy to grip, and it’s dishwasher safe, so you’ll spend less time cleaning and more time having fun!
input_text.Response B: Introducing the Ecolution Heavy Weight Eco-Friendly 8 Inch Fry Pan, a game-changer in the kitchen. Made with ultra-thick aluminum and a nonstick coating that is PFOA-free, this pan is built to last and perform. The aluminum ensures even heating and consistent results, while the nonstick surface makes cleaning a breeze. Plus, the soft silicone handle is easy to grip and stays cool, even when the pan is hot. And when it comes to sustainability, this pan is a star. Printed on 70% recycled materials and made with a Hydrolon water-based nonstick coating that is free of PFOA, this pan is not only good for the environment but also good for your kitchen. So why wait? Upgrade your cooking game with the Ecolution Heavy Weight Eco-Friendly 8 Inch Fry Pan.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
